channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP S/4 HANA (Statutory Reports)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP S/4 HANA (Statutory Reports)

item.title: CVE-2024-44121|2024-09-10T13:20:58.919Z -- sap_se -- sap%20s%2F4%20hana%20%28statutory%20reports%29
item.description: Under certain conditions Statutory Reports in SAP S/4 HANA allows an attacker with basic privileges to access information which would otherwise be restricted. The vulnerability could expose internal user data that should remain confidential. It does not impact the integrity and availability of the application
